item.title: Prakash Industries Gains 2.22%: 3 Key Factors Driving the Week
item.description: Prakash Industries Ltd closed the week ending 20 February 2026 with a 2.22% gain, outperforming the Sensex’s modest 0.39% rise. Despite a challenging start marked by a sharp 3.67% drop on Monday, the stock rebounded strongly through the week, supported by stabilising quarterly results and mixed but improving technical signals. This review analyses the key events shaping the stock’s performance and the implications for investors navigating a volatile ferrous metals sector. Time: 53 minutes ago

item.title: Aurobindo Pharma Gains 0.98%: 5 Key Factors Driving This Week’s Mixed Momentum

item.title: Brahmaputra Infrastructure Ltd Falls 1.95%: Key Events Behind the Week’s Volatility
